my game is not saving. i have to start from begining everytime. i m on windows 7. someone pls help. even after applying the 2nd update by skidrow. i downloaded this torrent.

i found out a simple way to save. run it after changing compatibility mode to windows xp sp3. to do so.. right click on shank shtcut>properties>compatibility tab>check on run incompatibility mode for xp. then yr gave will automatically save. its the best method...

it says "shank's main executable has encountered a problem and needs to close"

If it doesn't run it means your computer isn't good enough, The example of it proving your computer isn't good enough is when it opens up for around 2 seconds and closes instantly. :)

Love how you just jump to that conclusion Ima.
No, you may be able to run it, it could mean you need a better computer, but it could also be a crash.  Try to find the log for game in its folder and grab your system specs at the same time.

Strange, but I've downloaded many many torrents with a successful result as this: Go into your UTorrent options/setup guide, and reset your location. I'm d/ling about 1.2 megs a second due to the reset. Sometimes Utorrent doesn't save your settings like it says it does. Just FYI. Thanks for the torrent me_blindly!
